873030.name: Just Shapes & Beats - Monstercat Track Selection
873030.description:
From Monstercat comes a track selection straight out of Just Shapes & Beats! Listen to some of the game's tracks in MP3 form at the highest of quality, no even higher, HIGHER, yeah there we go.

Track listing:
  • Lets Be Friends - FTW
  • nanobii - Rainbow Road
  • Nitro Fun - Cheat Codes
  • Nitro Fun - Final Boss
  • Nitro Fun - New Game
  • Noisestorm - Barracuda
  • Pegboard Nerds - Try This
  • PIXL - Sugar Rush
  • Tokyo Machine - Hype
  • Tristam - Once Again
  • Tristam - Till It's Over
873030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
